name: Green Goo Balls In The Bouncing World FREE
name_original: Green Goo Balls In The Bouncing World FREE
description:
Follow me in the bouncing world of the green goos. Your needed help is easy: Control the Green Goo Balls to collect all the purple balls and leave the level with the green ring.

Sounds easy and the beginning is easy. The levels goes harder and harder and you have to master the seesaws, springs, gravity and the warp transporter.

Can you master all 40 levels to be the next Green Goo Balls Hero?

Features:
-40 outstanding levels
-You can use Tilt Device Mode or
-Button Mode
-Very addictive gameplay
-Suitable for all ages
-Easy to learn but very hard to master
-Fun sounds and music

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
